data.name: Syncope
data.detailed_description:
The main character of this adventure is Saul - the boy with the ability to wield a sword and magic. But don't rush to check it out.
First, you need to learn how to control your mind: don't let the pigs deceive you, don't let the spiders envelop you, dragons to burn you, and a greedy old woman to sit on your neck - for these things you no need swords and magic, just your mind, but sword and magic are needed to crush more than 20 kinds of enemies and their subspecies.



* Find your own path in the best traditions of metroidvania and discover secrets of this world
* Get rid of the evil in this place or stay neutral - just your decisions define your path
* Dive in this adventure with colorful characters, exciting stories, and funny dialogues.
* Become part of the world, not the center of it.
* If you can do it, kill the most vicious creatures in the bowels of the earth and over it
* Use sword and magic for creatures who do not understand human speech.
* Upgrade your gears to reach places where Saul had not yet set foot
* If you will find polycrystals don't sell them, they are very valuable - identifying them and you can learn new abilities
* Stop and rest - this place is filled with beautiful views
* Combine artifacts - their abilities will allow you to go to new hidden places
* Don't forget to look at your watch, because the music will immerse you in this world with your head so that's why you forget about the time.

data.short_description: Syncope - itâ€™s Metroidvania with an intricate plot that will immerse you in an adventurous journey through an exciting world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
